entry.title: Grill Shine Quick Wipes
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blitz
Type: Housewares
Price: 7.95

Blitz® Grill Shine Quick Wipes clean and restore the original brilliance to exterior metal grill surfaces. Simply wipe over the exterior of the grill to remove built-up grease and grime. This product contains no alcohol, no ammonia, no acids, no V.O.C. and no abrasives.

  • Non Toxic and Environmentally Friendly

entry.title: Lacquered Brass Care Cloth
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blitz
Type: Housewares
Price: 7.95

This 100% non-toxic Lacquered Brass Care Cloth is specially formulated for the care of lacquered brass jewelry and home accessories. The cotton flannel cloth is treated with cleaning and polishing agents that remove and inhibit tarnish! The good thing is, lacquered brass is simple to care for and doesn't require frequent polishing. This non-abrasive polishing cloth is specially treated to care for the lacquered surface and will continue to work even after the cloth has turned black!
  • Especially formulated for lacquered brass.
  • Do not wash, will remove special cleaning agents.
  • Cloth contains no harsh chemicals or abrasives.
  • Non-Toxic & Environmentally Friendly
  • Made in the USA
Blitz Stock # 20610 For uncoated brass, try Blitz Brass Care Cloth. NOTE: ALL CLOTHS MEASURED OPEN AND FLAT

entry.title: Stainless Steel Shine Polish
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blitz
Type: Housewares
Price: 8.95

Stainless Steel Shine Polish cleans and restores the original brilliance to stainless steel surfaces. This product contains no alcohol, no ammonia, no acids, no V.O.C. and no abrasives. CRITICAL: If an item is used for cooking, it is essential you insist that the cookware be washed thoroughly for sanitary reasons. This polish will not remove built up carbon. We recommend The Original Blitz Cloth Water marks might need several treatments to remove. Stainless steel is an alloy of steel and other metals. It comes in many grades. The usual rule of thumb is if a piece of stainless steel is magnetic (attracted by a magnet) it has the possibility of rusting. If it is non-magnetic it tends not to rust.
  • 8 FL OZ
  • Private Label available Visit our Wholesale Site for more info!
  • Non-Toxic and Environmentally Friendly
  • Made in the USA
Blitz Stock # 20641 CAUTION: DO NOT USE ON LACQUERED OR COATED SURFACES. ALWAYS FOLLOW MANUFACTURER'S RECOMMENDATIONS PRIOR TO USE.

entry.title: All Metal Shine Polish
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blitz
Type: Housewares
Price: 7.95

All Metal Shine Polish cleans and restores the original brilliance to brass, copper, chrome and stainless steel. This product contains no alcohol, no ammonia, no acids, no V.O.C. and no abrasives. CRITICAL: If an item is used for cooking, it is essential you insist that the cookware be washed thoroughly for sanitary reasons. Water marks might need several treatments to remove. Stainless steel is an alloy of steel and other metals. It comes in many grades. The usual rule of thumb is if a piece of stainless steel is magnetic it has the possibility of rusting. If it is non-magnetic it tends not to rust. Stainless may have a brushed look or a high mirror finish, and our cloths work well on these items if used properly. A typical application is to clean stainless steel refrigerators, sinks or cookware. It works well on ornaments and other stainless steel, too. What about stainless steel refrigerator doors? These doors are usually made of brushed steel but caution should be used. Aggressive rubbing on refrigerator doors will polish the brushed look and make it look a bit different. In some cases, the stainless steel may not be stainless steel (maybe it is soft steel or aluminum?), therefore the use of the polish will make the metal shine. There are instructions that come with the appliance and should be followed.
  • 8 FL OZ
  • Private Label available Visit our Wholesale Site for more info!
  • Non-Toxic and Environmentally Friendly
  • Made in the USA
Blitz Stock # 20640 CAUTION: DO NOT USE ON LACQUERED SURFACES. ALWAYS FOLLOW MANUFACTURER'S RECOMMENDATIONS PRIOR TO USE.

entry.title: All Metal Care Cloth "The Original Blitz Cloth"

Vendor: Blitz

The All Metal Care Cloth cleans and restores the original brilliance to brass, copper, chrome and stainless steel. This is the same "Blitz Cloth" that was made in 1912. The same cloth that Doughboys used in WWI, and that G.I. Joes used in WWII. Blitz your brass and metals in the legendary way. "The Polish is In The Cloth".
  • (1) 8" x 10" Polishing Cloth, (1) 8" x 10" Buffing Cloth
  • Do not wash, will remove special cleaning agents.

  • Non-Toxic and Environmentally Safe
